Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/KBWORYDPJN

We’ve worked with @envagency to develop new proposals to manage Bristol’s flood risk in the future. 
Tell us what you think before 20 December (tomorrow!)

text: Building leaky dams in this weeks heavy rain, strong winds & clarty ground conditions was tricky. This almost completed dam is 17m wide. Our 3d model estimates it will store 800 cubic m. A landscape scale #nfm project above Staveley for @SCRiversTrust @EnvAgencyNW #LakeDistrict https://t.co/Bau0O1hlWn
